name: Pokémon Electro Ball
overview: Story: You are a mere 12 year old child. A new Pokemon professor has moved to your town from The Kanto Region and he has brought some problems with him. Since his arrival, a Legendary Pokemon from The Unova Region has appeared. One day he calls upon you and asks you to fetch some secret information from his friend in other town. Will you be able to complete the task Professor Oak has given to you? Features: • New Region • New Graphics • New Tiles • New Pokemon (Gen 1-6) • New Story • Physical/Special/Status Split • New Moves • New Overworld sprites • Choose from Four Starters • Updated Pokemon Sprites • Travel with Ash & Brock • Pokemon League Tournament • New Characters & Rivals • Decaptilization
